page.title: 03LEISURE AND RECREATION
page.content:
In our area Leisure and Recreation facilities are extremely limited. There is a clay-pigeon shoot which is open to people 16 years of age and over. Walking in the area is restricted due to farmland,walking on the roads is dangerous due to excessive speed of vehicles.
There is a swimming pool in Cupar which is approximately 8 miles away. Cinema and theatre are catered for in St. Andrews which is 6 miles away. Excellent golfing facilities exsist in St. Andrews. Youth organisation are also to be found in St. Andrews and Cupar. The major problem is transport to the facilities as the public transport service is extremely limited . Children have to rely on parents transporting them to these centres which is not always convenient.
